instructions: If you re using AirPods, place them in your ears. Turn on Live Listen with one of the following methods: Open Control Center , tap the Hearing devices button , tap your hearing device or AirPods, then turn on Live Listen. (If you don t see the Hearing devices button , add it to Control Center go to Settings > Control Center > Customize Controls, then choose Hearing.) Triple-click the side button (on an iPhone with Face ID) or triple-click the Home button (on other iPhone models), tap Hearing Devices, then tap Live Listen. Position iPhone near the sound source.
